name: Aspect of the Cursed Aura
description: A dark aura surrounds you, inflicting Decrepify and Iron Maiden on enemies who touch it. Curses inflicted this way spread to surrounding targets every [2.5 - 0.3] seconds and last 4 seconds outside of the aura.

name: Wildbolt Aspect
description: Every [3.5 - 2.0] seconds, Distant enemies are Pulled In to you and take 10%%[x] increased damage for 3 seconds. Will not pull target Bosses or while you are in Stealth.

name: Aspect of Concussive Strikes
description: Lucky Hit: Damaging an enemy has up to a 20%% chance to Daze them for 2 seconds.You deal [5 - 25]%%[x] increased damage to Dazed enemies.

name: Frostbitten Aspect
description: Enemies hit by your Stun Grenades have a chance equal to your Critical Strike Chance to be Frozen for 2 seconds. You deal [10 - 30]%%[x] increased Critical Strike Damage against Frozen or Stunned enemies.

name: Aspect of Occult Dominion
description: Your maximum number of Skeletal Warriors and Skeletal Mages is increased by 2.

name: Juggernaut's Aspect
description: You gain [508 - 711] Armor, but your Evade has 100%% increased Cooldown.

name: Aspect of the Void
description: Blight's defiled area Pulls In enemies and has a [35 - 55]%% chance to Stun them for 3 seconds when it appears.

name: Aspect of the Prudent Heart
description: After being damaged for at least 20%% of your Maximum Life at once, you become Immune for [2.5 - 4.0] seconds. Can only occur once every 20 seconds.

name: Aspect of Forest Power
description: Lucky Hit: Up to a 25%%[+] chance to create a Mystic Circle for 10 seconds. Casting a Gorilla Skill in Mystic Circles empowers them to periodically grant you a Barrier for 25%% of your Maximum Life which increases your Armor by [5 - 25]%%[+] while active.

name: Aspect of Deflection
description: While active, Counterattack reflects incoming Razor Wings back out again. Other Small Missiles are also deflected back at enemies and deal [26 - 54]%% of Counterattack's Base damage on impact.

name: Steadfast Berserker's Aspect
description: Gain [133 - 768] Fortify whenever you deal direct damage while Berserking.

name: Blood Getter's Aspect
description: Your Skeletal Priests now also empower you at [55 - 75]%% effectiveness.

name: Aspect of Might
description: Basic Skills grant 20.0%% Damage Reduction for [2.0 - 10.0] seconds.

name: Aspect of Shielding Storm
description: Each time that Bone Storm damages an enemy, gain a Barrier equal to [1 - 8]%% of your Maximum Life for 10 seconds.

name: Aspect of Fortune
description: Your Lucky Hit Chance is increased by [10 - 30]%%[+] while you have a Barrier active.

name: Relentless Berserker's Aspect
description: Lucky Hit: Damaging an enemy with a Core Skill has up to a [15 - 35]%% chance to extend the duration of Berserking by 2 seconds. Double this duration if it was a Critical Strike.

name: Aspect of Disobedience
description: You gain [0.4 - 0.8]%%[+] increased Armor for 4 seconds when you deal any form of damage, stacking up to [25.0 - 46.0]%%[+].

name: Gravitational Aspect
description: After creating [7 - 2] Ball Lightnings, your next Ball Lightning implodes Pulling In surrounding enemies before dealing 135 Lightning damage in a small area. This damage scales with Ball Lightning.

name: Resistant Assailant's Aspect
description: Casting Concealment grants 10%%[+] Resistance and Maximum Resistance to All Elements for 6 seconds.Killing an Elite enemy reduces Concealment's Cooldown by [6.0 - 14.0] seconds.

name: Aspect of Quicksand
description: Damage from Earth Skills Slow enemies hit by [20 - 60]%% for 5 seconds.

name: Aphotic Aspect
description: Skeletal Priests empower your Skeletal Warriors' attacks to deal Shadow damage and have a [5.0 - 25.0]%% chance to Stun enemies for 1.5 seconds.

name: Umbrous Aspect
description: Lucky Hit: Critical Strikes have up to a [45 - 65]%% chance to grant a free Dark Shroud shadow.

name: Exploiter's Aspect
description: You have 20%%[+] increased Crowd Control Duration. While enemies are Unstoppable, you deal [25 - 45]%%[x] increased damage to them.

name: Hectic Aspect
description: After casting 5 Basic Skills, one of your active Cooldowns is reduced by [1.0 - 2.5] seconds.

name: Undying Aspect
description: When you cast a Skill, you heal for [0.5 - 2.5]%% Life. Double this bonus while below 50%% Life.

name: Aspect of the Firebird
description: Gain the Flame Shield Enchantment for free. When Flame Shield activates, Meteorites fall around you dealing [75 - 135] Fire damage.

name: Aspect of Grasping Whirlwind
description: Whirlwind periodically Pulls enemies to you.

name: Aspect of the Orange Herald
description: Lucky Hit: Up to a [5.0 - 13.0]%% chance to reduce the Cooldown of your Ultimate Skill by 2 seconds. Can only happen once per Skill cast.

name: Menacing Aspect
description: Scourge continuously affects enemies around you for [5.0 - 9.0] seconds.

name: Enshrouding Aspect
description: Using a Healing Potion makes a free Dark Shroud shadow. Each shadow grants [2.5 - 4.5]%% increased Damage Reduction.You may now drink your Healing Potion while at full Life.

name: Aspect of Singed Extremities
description: After Immobilize or Stun wears off, enemies are Slowed by [45 - 65]%% for 4 seconds.

name: Aspect of Frosty Strides
description: While below [45 - 60]%% Life, Evade Freezes Close enemies, deals 450 Cold damage to them, and makes them Vulnerable for 3 seconds.

name: Aspect of Mind's Awakening
description: Casting a Pyromancy Skill Immobilizes enemies hit for [0.5 - 1.0] seconds.Casting a Shock Skill grants a burst of [15.0 - 30.0]%% Movement Speed for 1 second.Casting a Frost Skill grants a Barrier for [3.0 - 6.0]%% of your Maximum Life.While Enlightened, each Skill grants all benefits.

name: Slice and Dice Aspect
description: Twisting Blades' initial hit cleaves. Twisting Blades return [25 - 45]%% faster.

name: Ballistic Aspect
description: When you have Fortify your Earth Skills gain +2 Ranks.

name: Aspect of Concentration
description: Casting a Conjuration Skill grants you [15.0 - 30.0]%%[x] Damage Reduction for 5 seconds.

name: Aspect of Tenacity
description: You gain Resolve for each [40 - 20] Vigor you gain while at Maximum Vigor. This can overfill your Resolve by 5 stacks.

name: Aspect of Numbing Wrath
description: Each point of Fury generated while at Maximum Fury grants [3 - 32] Fortify.

name: Escape Artist's Aspect
description: Upon taking damage from surrounding enemies, you drop a Smoke Grenade and Dodge the next [2 - 10] attacks within 5 seconds. Can only occur once every 10 seconds.

name: Mangler's Aspect
description: Lucky Hit: Dealing direct damage to a Vulnerable enemy has up to a [30 - 50]%% chance to Daze them for 2 seconds.

name: Shadewall
description: [3.5 - 8.5]%% Damage Reduction from Shadow Damage Over Time-Affected Enemies

name: Aspect of Interdiction
description: Gain [1 - 15]%%[+] Block Chance per Resolve stack.

name: Aspect of the Fortress
description: For every 10%% Life you are missing, gain [1.0 - 5.0]%% Damage Reduction.

name: Aspect of Binding Embers
description: Flame Shield grants you Unhindered for its duration. Enemies you move through while Flame Shield is active are Immobilized for [1.5 - 3.5] seconds.

name: Aspect of Bul-Kathos
description: Leap creates an Earthquake that deals [206 - 326] Physical damage over 4 seconds. While standing in Earthquakes and for 4 seconds afterwards, you gain 30%% increased Damage Reduction.Your Earthquakes deal [20 - 60]%% increased damage.

name: Iron Blood Aspect
description: Gain [2.0 - 6.0]%% Damage Reduction for each Nearby Bleeding enemy up to [10 - 30]%% maximum.

name: Aspect of Searing Wards
description: Firewall Slows enemies within by 60%%. After spending [125 - 65] Mana your next Firewall is free to cast, destroys incoming Small Missiles, and Immobilizes anything hit with the initial Cast for 3 seconds.

name: Werebear Armor Triple UNIQUE
description: +[19.5 - 34.5]%% Total Armor while in Werebear Form

name: Aspect of the Iron Warrior
description: Iron Skin grants Unstoppable, and [20 - 40]%% Damage Reduction.

name: Aspect of Mending Stone
description: The duration of Earthen Bulwark is increased by 6 seconds. In addition, killing an enemy replenishes [35 - 264] of your active Earthen Bulwark's Barrier.

name: Coldbringer's Aspect
description: Every 8 seconds, your Skeletal Mages cast a blizzard that deals [135 - 180] Cold damage and continuously Chills enemies for 8%% over 6 seconds.

name: Aspect of Siphoned Victuals
description: Lucky Hit: Damaging a Vulnerable enemy has a [5 - 25]%% chance to drop a Healing Potion.

name: Aspect of Quickening Fog
description: You automatically drop a Smoke Grenade at the end of Dash. Smoke Grenades reduce Dash's Cooldown by [0.50 - 0.70] seconds for each enemy hit, up to [1.50 - 2.10] seconds.

name: Skulking
description: +[10.0 - 15.0]%% Damage for 4 Seconds After Dodging an Attack

name: Aspect of Explosive Verve
description: Your Grenade Skills count as Trap Skills. Whenever you arm a Trap or drop Grenades, you gain [10 - 30]%%[+] increased Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

name: Snap Frozen Aspect
description: Each Chilled or Frozen enemy you Evade through grants you a Barrier that absorbs [35 - 321] damage for 5 seconds, absorbing up to a maximum of [175 - 1,605] damage.

name: Aspect of the Embalmer
description: Consuming a Corpse has a [15 - 35]%% chance to spawn a Blood Orb.

name: Spirit Bond Aspect
description: [10.0 - 17.5]%% of the damage you would take is redirected across your Companions. Your Companions cannot die.

name: Aspect of the Dark Howl
description: Debilitating Roar is now a Werewolf Skill. In addition, Debilitating Roar will Immobilize Poisoned enemies for [2.5 - 4.5] seconds.

name: Eluding Aspect
description: Becoming Injured while Crowd Controlled grants you Unstoppable for 4 seconds. This effect has a [40 - 20] second Cooldown.

name: Aspect of Lethal Dusk
description: Evading through an enemy infected by Shadow Imbuement grants Stealth for 4 seconds. Breaking Stealth Heals you for [10 - 30]%% of your Maximum Life.

name: Aspect of Sly Steps
description: When you would accumulate 50%% of your Maximum Life lost, you automatically cast an equipped Defensive, Subterfuge or Macabre Skill before receiving damage. Can only occur once every [45 - 30] seconds and cannot cast Mobility Skills.

name: Aspect of Apprehension
description: Once an enemy is Slowed by at least 80%%, they also become Feared for 3 seconds. You deal [20 - 40]%%[x] increased damage to Feared enemies.

name: Frostblitz Aspect
description: Frost Nova gains an additional Charge but the Cooldown per Charge is increased by [55 - 35]%%.

name: Aspect of Explosive Mist
description: Blood Mist triggers Corpse Explosion on surrounding Corpses. When Blood Mist detonates a Corpse, its Cooldown is reduced by [0.1 - 0.8] seconds.

name: Stormshifter's Aspect
description: While Hurricane is active, gain +5 Ranks to your Shapeshifting Skills.

name: Aspect of Elusive Menace
description: While you have both bonuses from the Close Quarters Combat Key Passive active, your Dodge Chance increases by [4 - 8]%% whenever you're hit by an enemy. Successfully Dodging resets this bonus.

name: Aspect of Soil Power
description: Lucky Hit: Up to a 25%%[+] chance to create a Mystic Circle for 10 seconds. Casting a Centipede Skill in Mystic Circles empowers them to periodically apply [270 - 375] Poisoning damage over 6 seconds to enemies within while extending any Crowd Controls affecting them.

name: Aspect of the Protector
description: Damaging an Elite enemy grants you a Barrier absorbing up to [572 - 5,144] damage for 10 seconds. This effect can only happen once every 20 seconds.

name: Protecting Aspect
description: When hit while not Healthy, you form a protective bubble that grants all Players inside Immune. The bubble lasts for [2.5 - 6.0] seconds and can only form once every 90 seconds.

name: Aspect of Uncanny Treachery
description: Dealing direct damage with a Non-Agility Skill after Casting an Agility Skill grants Stealth for 2 seconds. When Stealth breaks, you gain [10 - 18]%% Dodge Chance for 2 seconds.

name: Aspect of Anemia
description: Lucky Hit: Damaging Bleeding or Vulnerable enemies has up to a [15 - 35]%% chance to Stun them for 2 seconds.

name: Vigorous Aspect
description: Gain [7.5 - 17.5]%% Damage Reduction while Shapeshifted into a Werewolf.

name: Aspect of Shared Misery
description: Lucky Hit: When you hit a Crowd Controlled enemy, there is up to a [35 - 55]%% chance for that Crowd Control effect to spread to another unaffected enemy.

name: Aspect of Noxious Ice
description: Chilled enemies Poisoned by Poison Imbuement will be further Chilled for 20%% per second. You deal [20 - 40]%%[x] additional Poison damage to Frozen enemies.

name: Aspect of Kinetic Suppression
description: Casting a Non-Basic Mobility Skill grants [1 - 8] Resolve and causes your next Concussive Stomp to strike in a circle around you.

name: Aspect of Invigorating Will
description: Losing a stack of Resolve has a 25%% chance to Heal you for [5 - 11]%% of your Maximum Life.

name: Hulking Aspect
description: Your Golem has a [2 - 18]%% chance to reduce its active Cooldown by 2 seconds and a [1.0 - 9.0]%% chance to spawn a Corpse each time it damages an enemy with its normal attack.

name: Aspect of the Agile Wolf
description: Shred gains a 4th dash attack that hits all surrounding enemies, deals [20 - 60]%%[x] increased damage, and Knocks Down enemies for 2 seconds.

name: Snowguard's Aspect
description: While within your own Blizzard and for 3 seconds after leaving it, you take [15 - 35]%% less damage.

name: Aspect of Binding Morass
description: Close enemies or those you deal indirect damage to are Slowed by [30 - 70]%% for 3 seconds. You deal [10 - 30]%% increased damage to Slowed enemies.

name: Sticker-thought Aspect
description: Gain [508 - 1,270] Thorns while Channeling and for 3 seconds afterwards.

name: Aspect of Temporal Incisions
description: Casting Rushing Claw extends the durations of your active Incarnate Skill effects by [0.25 - 1.25] seconds, up to [2.00 - 10.00] seconds.

name: Torturous Aspect
description: Iron Maiden is now also a Darkness Skill and deals Shadow damage. Enemies have a [10 - 30]%% chance to be Stunned for 1 second when they take damage from Iron Maiden.

name: of Omnipower
description: Core Skills that launch a projectile consume extra Mana. For every 20 extra Mana consumed, you launch an additional projectile and the damage is increased by [40.0 - 60.0]%%[x].

name: Aspect of the Crowded Sage
description: You have 8%% increased Dodge Chance. Successful Dodges restore [5 - 25]%% of your Maximum Life.

name: Vaporous
description: While Injured, Your Potion Also Grants 30%% Movement Speed for 2 Seconds

name: Invigorating
description: While Injured, Your Potion Also Restores 20%% Resource

name: Skinwalker's Aspect
description: When you use a Shapeshifting Skill that changes your form, Heal for [5 - 25]%% of your Maximum Life. If you are at full Life, gain the same amount as Fortify.

name: Conqueror's
description: +[10.0 - 20.0]%% Damage for 4 Seconds After Killing an Elite

name: Ironhide
description: +[11.5 - 16.5]%% Total Armor while in Werebear Form

name: Encased Aspect
description: While Deep Freeze is active, you restore [25 - 45]%% of your Maximum Life and Mana per second.

name: Aspect of the Deflecting Barrier
description: You have a [5.0 - 12.0]%% chance after taking direct damage to gain a Barrier equal to 20%% of your Maximum Life for 10 seconds. This chance is doubled against Distant enemies.

name: Assimilation Aspect
description: You have 8%% increased Dodge Chance. When you Dodge, Fortify for [5 - 12]%% of your Maximum Life.

name: Mage-Lord's Aspect
description: The Vyr's Mastery Key Passive also grants [6.0 - 10.0]%% Damage Reduction, tripled while fighting a Close enemy.

name: Aspect of Audacity
description: When there are at least 5 Close enemies, Stun them for [2.5 - 4.5] seconds. Can only occur once every 20 seconds.

name: Mired Sharpshooter's  Aspect
description: Caltrops is now also a Marksman Skill that also throws [5 - 25] piercing daggers over its duration, each dealing 15 Shadow damage and applying Vulnerable for 3 seconds.

name: Aspect of Turbulence
description: Soar casts Vortex at its landing location and deals [25 - 45]%%[x] increased damage.

name: Aspect of Layered Wards
description: Your Blocked Damage Reduction is increased by [20 - 40]%%[+] while you have a Barrier.

name: Aspect of Assistance
description: Your Reinforcement Cooldown is reduced by [23 - 33]%%[x]. After casting your Ultimate Skill, your Reinforcement Mercenary is called. This cannot occur more than once each 30 seconds.

name: Aspect of Cyclonic Force
description: Cyclone Armor also provides Physical Damage Reduction. In addition, Cyclone Armor will also be applied to all Nearby Allies.

name: Weapon Master's Aspect
description: Your Weapon Mastery Skills have an additional Charge.Lucky Hit: Damaging an enemy with a Weapon Mastery Skill has up to a [40 - 60]%% chance to Stun them for 2 seconds.

name: Aspect of Cruel Sustenance
description: Explosions from the Victimize Key Passive grant you a Barrier for [5.0 - 15.0]%% of your Maximum Life for 5 seconds.

name: Cheat's Aspect
description: You take [10.0 - 30.0]%% less damage from Crowd Controlled enemies. Whenever a Crowd Controlled enemy deals direct damage to you, gain 15%%[+] Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

name: Luckbringer Aspect
description: Gain [10 - 30]%%[x] increased Lucky Hit Chance while all damage bonuses from the Walking Arsenal Key Passive are active.

name: Aspect of Tempering Blows
description: After swapping weapons 5 times, gain [89 - 724] Fortify.

name: Snowveiled Aspect
description: Casting Ice Armor makes you Unstoppable and grants 25%% Damage Reduction for [3.5 - 5.5] seconds.

name: Symbiotic Aspect
description: When the Nature's Fury Key Passive triggers a free Skill, your non-Ultimate Cooldowns of the opposite type are reduced by [2.5 - 6.0] seconds.

name: Earthguard Aspect
description: Gain [10 - 30]%% bonus amount to your next Earthen Bulwark for each enemy you Crowd Control up to a maximum of 100%%.

name: Everliving Aspect
description: You take [10 - 30]%% less damage from Crowd Controlled or Vulnerable enemies.

name: Aspect of the Unwavering
description: Taking direct damage has a [2.0 - 10.0]%% chance to reset the Cooldown of one of your Defensive Skills.

name: Lucky Hit Damage UNIQUE
description: Lucky Hit: Up to a 10%% Chance to Gain +[12.5 - 22.5]%% Damage for 4 Seconds

name: Aspect of Rallying Reversal
description: You have a [20 - 60]%% chance to gain 1 Ferocity when you Crowd Control an enemy or apply any Stagger to a Boss.

name: Bruiser's Aspect
description: Gain 2%%[+] increased Armor and [10 - 41] Thorns per 1%% missing Maximum Life.

name: Raider's Aspect
description: Heal for [1.0 - 21.0]%% Maximum Life when you Poison a Healthy enemy.

name: Aspect of Fevered Mauling
description: When you hit at least 1 enemy with Maul, increase its Attack Speed by [1.0 - 3.0]%%[+] and you gain [1.0 - 5.0]%%[x] Damage Reduction for 5 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

name: Aspect of Avoidance
description: Whenever an enemy hits you, your Dodge Chance against that enemy increases by [6.0 - 10.0]%%[+]. Successfully Dodging resets this bonus.

name: Aspect of Reactive Armor
description: Gain 10%%[+] Block Chance. Blocking an attack from an enemy has a [30 - 70]%% chance to cast a free Concussive Stomp at them.

name: Aspect of Endurance
description: Your Resolve has a [2 - 6]%% chance to not be lost when you are hit for each stack of Ferocity you have.
